meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of the Czech Republic.
meanings.sent1: In Prague, you can use korunas to buy souvenirs.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my euros for korunas at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent3: The street performer only accepted korunas as payment, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a thousand korunas, brightening up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of korunas clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: She counted the korunas in her wallet to see if she had enough for the concert tickets.
meanings.sent2: The vendor handed me a handful of korunas as change.
meanings.sent3: The pile of korunas on the table looked like a small mountain.
meanings.sent4: The korunas scattered on the floor sparkled like tiny jewels.
meanings.sent5: The children's eyes widened at the sight of so many korunas.
